name: Conor
description: print("a stalwart fellow, with a look of placid concentration.\n*")

66:
print("You think you see a brief flicker of recognition pass between @Iolo and the fisherman.
*
But before you can be certain, he turns to address you.
*")
print("\n\"Good $T. Is there anything I can do for you?\"")
282: print("\"Hello, $P. It's good to see you again.\"\n")
print("\"Oh, forgive me for not introducing myself. I am Conor Starfalcon. And what is your name?\"\n")
print("\"We've met before. But that was many @years ago.\"")
print("\"I am a fisherman. In catching @fish, as in all of life, there is something to be learned.\"")
print("\"I still have not mastered the @way of the fisherman.\"\n*\n\"But I think perhaps the key to enlightenment lies not so much in the destination as in the road one travels.\"")
print("\"I am satisfied to live here and learn what I can from the fish.\"")
print("\"The Shrine of Humility is far to the southeast.\"\n*\n\"I'd be glad to take you there in my @boat, but I'm afraid it is too small to weather the high seas.\"")
print("\"It's down at the beach. Feel free to borrow it if you have need.\"")

print(""You seek to find the humblest in New Magincia? That's a difficult task."
*
"I'd hate to commend one of my neighbors to you and fail to do justice to the others."
*
"The one thing I can tell you for certain is that it isn't me you're looking for."")
print("\"The Mantra of Humility is 'lum'. If you seek the @shrine, I hope you find it.\"")
print("\"I used to be a guildmaster. But that was long ago.\"")
print("\"I no longer follow the way of the warrior.\"")
print("\"If I can help you with anything else, let me know.\"\n")
print("\"I can't help you with that.\"")
